amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out the Appraised Value Offer program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to carry out the Appraised Value Offer program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Babin.
